name: Albert's Amazing Escape
description:
"Hello Albert, I'm Todd. I have a game for you, Albert. See if you can get through the mazes...before you die!"

And so begins Albert's desperate journey through Todd's deadly series of mazes. As the clock counts down, Albert must get through each maze in time, all the while avoiding fatal traps. He may find some helpful objects along the way, but each maze brings new challenges (and new hairstyles). 

With these long odds, can Albert somehow still make an amazing escape?
